page.title: 05TIMSBURY WILDLIFE
page.content: Twenty five people were asked to fill in our questionnaire.They all lived in the villages of Timsbury and Tunley. They were asked what wildlife they see daily. They were asked to consider the following animals - rabbits, foxes, squirrels,hares,badgers,hedgehogs, moles,rats and voles. We conducted our survey in four different places in Timsbury - The Square. The Glebe, Overdale and Greenvale. {Our Results. We found that more people see night animals than day animals. The animals seen most often were the hedgehog and foxes. Another survey on birds showed that the robin,starling and sparrow are seen most often in this area. { By Ben Sanderson,Ben Russell, { Shawn and Craig.
